Thecode, I'm not going to acknowledge Dracona untill you write a sensable 
e-mail.

::Zardus/Prowl/Shredder::

Zardus nods. "Most of the energon is in the storing facilities. The rest can 
be mined. The cargo hold is this way in case you wish to see it." He says, 
pointing down a hallway.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl exits the CR chamber. It felt good to be repaired. He walks off toward 
the bridge.

On his way there, he sees Iron Raptor.

"Are you all right?" He asks, looking her over to make sure she was fully 
healed.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder listens to Quickstrike in disgust. "Megatron is not dead. He just 
contacted me and told me I'm in charge."

He turns as he sees Pyro, Hiss, and Breakdown land. He looks quizzically from 
Quickstrike to the mercenaries. "Friends of yours?"
